libICEpost.src.base.Functions.functionsForDictionaries
======================================================

.. py:module:: libICEpost.src.base.Functions.functionsForDictionaries

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   @author: F. Ramognino       <federico.ramognino@polimi.it>
   Last update:        12/06/2023

   Functions for handling dictionaries.



Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   libICEpost.src.base.Functions.functionsForDictionaries.lookupOrDefault
   libICEpost.src.base.Functions.functionsForDictionaries.dictFromTemplate
   libICEpost.src.base.Functions.functionsForDictionaries.checkDictEntries
   libICEpost.src.base.Functions.functionsForDictionaries.checkDictTypes


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:function:: lookupOrDefault(Dict, Entry, Default)

   Dict:       dict
   Entry:      -
   Default:    -

   Look from 'Entry' in 'Dict'. If not found, return 'Default'.


.. py:function:: dictFromTemplate(Dict, TemplateDict, **argv)

   Dict:           dict
   TemplateDict:   dict

   Keyword arguments:
   intAsFloat:     bool (True)
       Treat int as floats for type-checking

   Set the entries in a dictionaries from a template dictionary.


.. py:function:: checkDictEntries(Dict, entryList)

   Dict:           dict
       Dictionary to be checked
   entryList:      list
       List of entries to assess if present in the dicitonary

   Keyword arguments:
   intAsFloat:     bool (True)
       Treat int as floats for type-checking

   Checks if all the keys in entryList are present in the dictionary.


.. py:function:: checkDictTypes(Dict, entryTypes)

   Dict:           dict
       Dictionary to be checked
   entryTypes:     dict
       {
           'entry_ii':     tuple<type>
       }
       Dictionary containing the acceptable types for each entry to be
       checked.

   Checks if all the keys of entryTypes are present in the dictionary and
   of correct type.
